todos.content: Rename crate directories: oqto->oqto, oqto-browser->oqto-browser, etc.
Update all Cargo.toml files (crate names, binary names, dependencies)
Replace oqto/Oqto strings in all Rust source files
Replace oqto/Oqto strings in all TypeScript/frontend files
Rename binary source files (oqto-runner.rs -> oqto-runner.rs etc.)
Update docs, README, AGENTS.md, justfile, deploy files
Update frontend tauri config, package names, settings app keys
Update logo references in frontend to use oqto_ logos
Run remote-build check to verify no compile errors
